author: __flcl
content:
OK let us spawn a Goerli node and stop devnet-12 one.
Btw `eth_gasPrices` will not be in final API, stays there just to find potential highly interested proponents.
`eth_blobGasPrice` will be renamed to `eth_blobBaseFee` looks like soon

author: __flcl
content: https://hackmd.io/hwscuUSBQaGAfa3dbYt9zA#Prototype now contains both goerli and devnet-12 URLs to query using updated gas API

author: koloz193
content: question on replacing transactions, weve been testing out submitting some blobs and have sent quite a few underpriced transactions. we've only been able to replace them with other blob txns vs self transfers. is this expected?

author: parithosh
content: afaik there are mempool rules as to what is allowed in the mempool - i.e if a blob tx is in there, you can't have a regular tx in the mempool from that account as well. Unsure if every EL does it this way, but afaik geth enforces this. This ofc doesn't influence whats on the mempool of another node.
